Module resolution:

Here's why 'lodash' works:
1. Lookup lodash from type root. 
2. Look for lodash.d.ts, but not present.
3. Look for `lodash` folder: found.
4. Look at package.json for typesVersions redirects.
5. Look in lodash/ts3.1 for index.d.ts: found.
2. Look at package.json

Here's how 'lodash/fp' fails:
1. Lookup lodash/fp from type root.
2. Look for lodash/fp.d.ts: found.

Resolution never gets to steps (3) and (4), which trigger the redirect. Instead, you get the parent lodash/fp.d.ts, not lodash/ts3.1/fp.d.ts.

This only applies to DT itself; the ts3.1 packages published on npm will only have the contents of the ts3.1 directory.
